name: blanche (johnmgrace)
description:
Blanche is a puzzle-solving adventure. The player responsibly washes Blanche, a child's plush squirrel doll, in the washing machine. This proves disastrous for Blanche, who vows revenge.

Unique Features:
+ Written in Rust using the ggez game library. To display video, it uses mpv (and the mpv Rust library).
+ Utilizes video and photography to tell a story as the player explores and solves puzzles on Blanche's cell phone.

Team:
Dan Wilhelm - https://www.linkedin.com/in/danielwilhelm/
John Grace - https://www.linkedin.com/in/john-grace/
Aries Serrano - https://www.linkedin.com/in/aries-serrano-1783a713b/

Assets:
+ All video, photography, images, and voices are original.
+ Blanche is a dog squeaky toy created by BarkShop (purchased during the game jam).
+ Boom sound: https://freesound.org/people/bareform/sounds/218721/
+ All music by Kevin MacLeod:

Professor Umlaut, Not As it Seems, Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
